beautifulwork¶

beautifulwork project is about documentation, sharing and helping of spiritual and learning process

Features¶

  • Learn how to use shell commands.
  • Knowledge of using GNU debugger (gdb).
  • Understand solutions of project euler problems.
  • Finding details about proc filesystem.
  • Examples of fundamental programs of GNU/Linux.
  • Introduction to debug session of Python and Ruby debugger.
  • Important commandline technique to recover a deleted file.
  • Source code of bit twiddling hacks in C.
  • Algorithms of sorting in multiple languages.
  • Collection of debian commands.
  • Images of graphs plotted using R.
  • Method to deal with a Critical crash of a base library.

Installation¶

  • git clone https://github.com/ahiliation/beautifulwork.git

Contribute¶

  • Issue Tracker: github.com/ahiliation/beautifulwork/issues
  • Source Code: github.com/ahiliation/beautifulwork

Support¶

If you are having issues, please let me know. e-mail: ahiliation@yahoo.co.in
